servicesGrid.title: Over 30 years of excellence in Fire Engineering
paragraphs: SMH SYSTEMS operates throughout Brazil with its own team and international certifications, offering complete solutions for fire prevention and protection.
We protect lives, data, assets, and connectivity ‚Äî ensuring business continuity even in critical situations.
Experts in mission-critical environments and special risks, we serve leaders in telecom, data centers, finance, industry, and construction sectors.
We provide design, certified equipment, installation, maintenance, technical support, and gas refilling.

list.title: Preventive Maintenance
list.description: We perform periodic inspections and technical adjustments to prevent failures and keep systems always operational.

list.title: Corrective Maintenance
list.description: We act on the immediate identification and repair of failures, quickly restoring system functionality.

list.title: System Adaptation
list.description: We adapt and update existing systems to meet technical standards and specific client needs.

list.title: Leak Test
list.description: We check the sealing of pipes and connections to ensure there are no leaks in pressurized systems.

list.title: Ultrasound Test
list.description: We use ultrasonic technology to detect internal flaws in materials and components without causing damage.

list.title: Hydrostatic Test
list.description: We conduct tests with pressurized water to assess the strength and integrity of fire combat networks.

list.title: Siren Test
list.description: We inspect and test sound alarm systems to ensure their effectiveness in emergency situations.
